mapper.select: select rno,pNo,fk_dcode,assignDate,startDate,dueDate,endDate,fk_employeeid,hurryno,ingdetail,pName,fk_managerid,name from ( select row_number() over(order by P.pNo asc) as rno, P.pNo, name, T.fk_dcode,to_char(assignDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as assignDate , to_char(P.startDate ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(dueDate ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dueDate, to_char(P.endDate ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, T.fk_employeeid,hurryno,ingdetail,pname, T.fk_managerid from tbl_todo T join tbl_product P on P.pNo = T.fk_pNo join tbl_employee E on E.employeeid = T.fk_managerid where T.fk_managerid = #{fk_managerid} and assigndate is null )V where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno} order by dueDate asc
select count(*) from tbl_todo T join tbl_product P on P.pNo = T.fk_pNo where fk_managerid = #{employeeid} and assigndate is null
mapper.update: update tbl_todo set fk_employeeid = #{employeeid}, assignDate = sysdate, hurryno = #{hurryno} where fk_pNo = #{pNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_todo T join tbl_product P on P.pNo = T.fk_pNo where fk_managerid = #{employeeid} and assigndate is not null

select rno,pNo,fk_dcode,assignDate,nvl(startDate,'-') as startDate,dueDate,endDate,fk_employeeid,hurryno,ingdetail,pName,fk_managerid,name from ( select row_number() over(order by hurryno desc, dueDate asc) as rno, P.pNo, name, T.fk_dcode,to_char(assignDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as assignDate , to_char(T.startDate ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(dueDate ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dueDate, to_char(P.endDate ,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, T.fk_employeeid,hurryno,ingdetail,pname, T.fk_managerid from tbl_todo T join tbl_product P on P.pNo = T.fk_pNo join tbl_employee E on E.employeeid = T.fk_managerid where T.fk_managerid = #{fk_managerid} and assignDate is not null )V where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select count(*) from tbl_todo T join tbl_product P on P.pNo = T.fk_pNo join tbl_employee E on E.employeeid = T.fk_managerid join tbl_employee E1 on E1.employeeid = T.fk_employeeid where T.fk_managerid = #{employeeid} and pname like '%' || #{searchProject} || '%' and E1.name like '%' || #{searchWhoCharge} || '%' ${statusChoice}
and dueDate >= to_date(to_char(sysdate-to_number(#{period}),'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')

select ingdetail, pname, miniNo, maxNo,nowNo, to_char(P.startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate,to_char(P.endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, P.endDate-P.startDate as period,pNo,to_char(T.endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as tendDate from tbl_todo T join tbl_product P on T.fk_pNo = P.pno where pno = #{pNo}

select clientname,cnumber,clientmobile from ( select row_number() over(order by cnumber desc) as rno,clientname,to_number(cnumber) as cnumber, (substr(clientmobile,0,3)||'-'||substr(clientmobile,3,4)||'-'||substr(clientmobile,7,4)) as clientmobile from tbl_client C join tbl_todo T on C.fk_pNo = T.fk_pNo where C.fk_pNo = #{pNo} ) V where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
select ceil(count(*)/#{sizePerPage}) from tbl_client C join tbl_todo T on C.fk_pNo = T.fk_pNo where C.fk_pNo = #{pNo}
select to_char(min(enddate),'yyyy-mm') as minEndDate, to_char(max(enddate),'yyyy-mm') as maxEndDate from tbl_todo where fk_dcode like '%' || #{dcode} || '%' and enddate is not null

select count(*) as cnt,fk_employeeid,name from ( select T.fk_employeeid as employeeid as fk_employeeid,name from tbl_todo T join tbl_employee E on T.fk_employeeid = E.employeeid where T.fk_dcode=#{dcode} and enddate between to_date(#{lastDate},'yyyy-mm') and to_date(#{finalDate},'yyyy-mm') ) group by (employeeid,name)

select (select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{firstDate} and fk_employeeid=#{employeeid}) as selectCnt ,(select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')= to_char(add_months(to_date(#{firstDate},'yyyy-mm'),-1),'yyyy-mm') and fk_employeeid=#{employeeid}) as prevCnt ,(select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')= to_char(add_months(to_date(#{firstDate},'yyyy-mm'),-2),'yyyy-mm') and fk_employeeid=#{employeeid}) as ppreveCnt from dual

select (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{firstDate},'yyyy-mm'),-1),'yyyy-mm')from dual) as middleDate ,(select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{firstDate},'yyyy-mm'),-2),'yyyy-mm')from dual) as lastDate from dual

select DCnt,totalCnt,prevDCnt,trunc((DCnt/totalCnt)*100,1) as percentage from ( select (select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{selectedDate} and fk_dcode=#{dcode}) as DCnt ,(select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(to_date(#{selectedDate},'yyyy-mm'),-1),'yyyy-mm') and fk_dcode=#{dcode}) as prevDCnt ,(select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{selectedDate}) as totalCnt from dual )

select nowCnt,prevCnt,pprevCnt,(nowCnt+prevCnt+pprevCnt) as totalCnt from ( select (select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{firstDate} and fk_dcode=#{dcode}) as nowCnt ,(select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(to_date(#{firstDate},'yyyy-mm'),-1),'yyyy-mm') and fk_dcode=#{dcode}) as prevCnt ,(select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(to_date(#{firstDate},'yyyy-mm'),-2),'yyyy-mm') and fk_dcode=#{dcode}) as pprevCnt from dual )

select trunc(avg(nowCnt+prevCnt+pprevCnt)/3,0) as avgCnt from ( select (select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{selectedMonth} and fk_dcode='1') as nowCnt, (select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{selectedMonth} and fk_dcode='2') as prevCnt, (select count(*) from tbl_todo where to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm')=#{selectedMonth} and fk_dcode='3') as pprevCnt from dual )

select rscno, rcdate, rctime, carname, rdestination, nvl(rcpeople,'없음') as rcpeople, rcsubject,name from tbl_car C join tbl_rscar R on c.cno = r.fk_cno join tbl_employee E on E.employeeid = R.fk_employeeid where cstatus = '0'
